summary: First look at the animated characters of Moominvalley TV series revealed
title: First look at the animated characters of Moominvalley TV series revealed
excerpt: The first look at the heart-warming and lively Moomin characters of the highly anticipated new Moomin animation series Moominvalley has been revealed today.
description: Guys! If you’re interested in the new Moominvalley series, PLEASE CHECK THIS OUT! They are making so much progress that I am more than beyond excited for the new series. OMG! It looks amazing. There isn’t an English trailer yet, but that right now doesn’t matter to me because I am too hyped to even think when a trailer could be released. The show will apparently be aired in Spring 2019. Not too long now.

blog.name: germancitygirl
blog.title: An Asian on Occasion.
blog.description:
1. I like living in a bamboo grove with GermanCity and our loquacious cat.

2. I like old films, RPGs, spontaneous road trips, and singing loudly.

3. I like witty banter and genuine people.

4. I like driving fast... or as fast as I can manage. #leadfoot

5. I like cool music + hot musicians... a LOT.

6. I like a heady brew of #4 and #5 often.

7. I like a great many things and am mercurial in my crushes.

8. I like hoarding pens and am an impenitent word nerd.

9. I like hot buttered popcorn and ube mamon more than I should.

10. If you are curious about anything else, ask. I don't bite... much.

Finally, the opinions expressed here are mine alone, and do not reflect the opinions of GeekGirlCon or any employee thereof. GeekGirlCon is not responsible for the accuracy of any of the information supplied by the author or content that appears.

“My feminism will be intersectional or it will be bullshit.” - Flavia Dzodan.

summary: Helsinki-based Gutsy Animation offers a first-look at the series artwork for its new CG adaptation of Tove Jansson’s Moomin...
caption: Helsinki-based Gutsy Animation offers a first-look at the series artwork for its new CG adaptation of Tove Jansson’s Moomin tales, Moominvalley.The series will launch in Spring 2019 in the U.K., and in Finland in February 2019.

reblog.comment: Helsinki-based Gutsy Animation offers a first-look at the series artwork for its new CG adaptation of Tove Jansson’s Moomin tales, Moominvalley.The series will launch in Spring 2019 in the U.K., and in Finland in February 2019.

trail.content: Helsinki-based Gutsy Animation offers a first-look at the series artwork for its new CG adaptation of Tove Jansson’s Moomin tales, Moominvalley.The series will launch in Spring 2019 in the U.K., and in Finland in February 2019.

blog.name: animationtidbits
blog.title: Animation Tidbits
blog.description:
A collection of interesting art and animation work/news I find during my day-to-day journeys on the internet.

I'm a 3D character animator and artist. For my personal work check out my website or the art tag on my personal tumblr. I also post at OnAnimation, among other places.

Feel free to ask questions.
